abstract: Merck is selling its Merial stake to clear a path for its merger with Schering-Plough, but it could create an even bigger joint venture with Sanofi after that deal wins approval.
snippet: Merck is selling its Merial stake to clear a path for its merger with Schering-Plough, but it could create an even bigger joint venture with Sanofi after that deal wins approval.
lead_paragraph: The drug giant Merck said Thursday it would sell its stake in a big animal-health joint venture for $4 billion  but with a side deal that could eventually let the company create an even bigger version of the same business.

headline.main: Merck Selling Stake in Animal Venture
headline.print_headline: Merck Selling Stake in Animal Venture
